org.modelmapper.builder.ConditionExpression

    Package Description
    org.modelmapper.builder
    Expression types for building Mappings and TypeMaps

    • Uses of ConditionExpression in org.modelmapper.builder

      Methods in org.modelmapper.builder that return ConditionExpression 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConditionExpression<S,D> ConditionExpression.when(Condition<?,?> condition)
      Specifies the condition that must apply in order for mapping to take place for a particular destination property hierarchy.
